channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wall Street gets rude shock as Bessent plays second fiddle on tariffs
item.description: Senior counselor Peter Navarro and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick dominated the president’s attention on tariffs..

item.title: Trump’s ‘Liberation Day’ leaves the world trading system without a leader: ‘The era of rules-based globalization and free trade is over’
item.description: For decades, the U.S. was at the center of the rules-based trading system, thanks to the WTO and its massive consumer market. No longer.

item.title: 7 smart money moves to make instead of checking your battered 401(k) right now
Musk hopes US, Europe move to zero-tariff free-trade zone
item.description: Musk also suggested that Peter Navarro’s Harvard degree is “a bad thing” and that the senior White House official has never built anything.

item.title: EU answer to Trump may involve data use by Big Tech, France says
item.description: "For example, we can strengthen certain environmental requirements or regulate the use of data by certain digital players."

item.title: Trump tariffs could help clear the way for bigger tax cuts as Congress eyes a potential revenue windfall — and a shrinking economy
item.description: Economists at Citi Research said in a note on Thursday that the aggressive tariffs "may now become a justification for larger tax cuts."

item.title: Trump tariffs were calculated four times too high, says conservative think tank
A VA program helped thousands of veterans keep their homes. Trump is ending it.
Tether is betting big on the dollar. Why it faces challenges from Trump tariffs.
Can AI fix Social Security? Its likely new boss says so, but critics have doubts
